text: MHPArena () is a stadium located in Stuttgart, Baden-Württemberg, Germany and home to German Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart. Before 1993 it was called Neckarstadion , named after the nearby river Neckar and between 1993 and July 2008 it was called Gottlieb-Daimler-Stadion . From the 2008–09 season, the stadium was renamed the Mercedes-Benz Arena.Arsenal: Friendly against VfB Stuttgart announced On 1 July 2023, it was renamed the MHPArena. ==References== Category:Football stadiums in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in Baden-Württemberg Category:Stuttgart
title: MHPArena
